entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • sendpacketselement_filestreamwithoptions_success fails with timeout #63523
  • sendpacketselement_filestreamlargeoffset_throws fails with timeout #63522
  • sendpacketselement_filestreammultipartmixed_multiplefilestreams_success fails #63521
  • Avoid global:: qualifying all names in the Regex source generator #63512
    7.0.0
  • Allow configuration binding to set-only properties #63508
  • Build x64/arm64 cross-architecture DAC for Linux #63506
    7.0.0
  • What is the purpose of hashing in a PDB Document? #63505
  • Move Regex source generator generated helper methods to a shared class #63502
    7.0.0
  • JIT should vectorize zeroing constant stackalloc-s #63500
  • VN does not number some HWI loads properly #63499
    7.0.0
  • interface like mono_domain_create_appdomain is declared but there is no implemention. #63494
    7.0.0
  • Normalize `Vector64/Vector128.Create(0)/Create(0,0, ..)` to `Vector64/Vector128.Zero` #63490
  • Find a way to get data from embedded resource without reflection #63488
  • Test failure System.Tests.GCExtendedTests.GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread(size: 1000) #63487

Closed

  • code-generator: loop-invariant expressions left within loop blocks #63516
  • SocketsHttpHandler: Improve handling of failed connection attempts #60654
    7.0.0
  • User Secrets not loading Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting 6.0 #63246
    6.0.x
  • Vector.Narrow performance #9766
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.EncryptingAndDecryptingAsymmetric.AsymmetricEncryptionRoundtripUseOAEP #62827
  • Net 6.0 assembly dynamic loading and (un)/reloading not possible anymore? #63509
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not ignore delegate properties #62354
    6.0.x
  • Subsequent Grpc calls with WinHttpHandler to an IIS hosted service fail #60291
    6.0.x
  • Different behavior of ECDsa.ExportParameters between .NET 4.8 and .NET [Core] #62813
  • Crash on WindowsCryptographicException on net60 GA #61417
  • [API Proposal]: Add a SHA-256 Thumbprint convenience property to X509Certificate2 #62425
  • CultureNotFoundException in Net6 but works in Net5 on same system #62929
    7.0.0
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler token expiration date validation fails if date more than 25 years #63001
  • Issue with HexEncoder #61047
  • Make KeyDerivationAlgorithm a primitive #17655
    Future
  • `HttpClient.SendAsync(...)` may fail to return response that's returned by server prior to completion of sending full request. #57186
    Future
  • Options pattern does not work if I initialize the IEnumerable type model #63083
  • [Proposal]: [String.SplitAsSpan] #63497
  • JIT cannot devirtualize interface call in trivial cases #63283
  • Linux Docker Container #63094
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests failing on windows #52843
    7.0.0
  • Inter-process Mutex doesn't work for processes of different architectures on Apple Silicon #62140
    6.0.x
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntityWithExpiredRevocation #63486

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63520
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    area-Single-File
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fixes Event Log Message Format on Unmanaged FailFast #63517
    community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Fix step on ios when using interpreter #63515
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63514
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Move localloc/common library under JIT folder #63510
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Draft][Perf] Enable LLVM on perf runs #63504
    area-Infrastructure
  • [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63503
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Add more automated test coverage for the wasm bindings as prep for custom marshalers #63498
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values (#62798) #63493
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Port test-only test fixes #63507
    area-Meta
  • Show test names in merged wrapper execution log #63511
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63431
    arch-arm32, area-Single-File, 6.0.x
  • Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63472
    area-System.Text.Json
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Move init-vs-env in test build script down #63433
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62350
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 5.0.x
  • Clarify P/Invoke shims guidance for OOB assemblies #63470
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update coverlet and reportgenerator versions #63491
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63495
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp version to 4.0.1 #63492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63423
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.2
  • Bump SdkVersionForWorkloadTesting to use a 200 band SDK #63450
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Creating Cultures with Sort Names #63386
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #63346
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Sign ILVerification.dll #63471
    area-ILVerification
  • Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63496
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Support for specifying max depth of generic cycle #63435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Test][Revert] Reverted change to global build job #63483
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1541995 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Fix Fiji time zone time conversion #63476
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests] Fix, and simplify sample building on CI #63429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make it easier to enable FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE #63478
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63482
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #63454
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: rework logic for when OSR imports method entry #63406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Disable MemoryMappedFileTests failing on macOS/arm64 + coreclr due to too long path #63438
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
